channel.title: How To Post
channel.description:
OK this may not be as good or as funny at the sticky but i thought id post it n e way + its more for this version of smf; here come the flames; oh yeahs btw this was made for my forums so a few things may b different
[u][b]What Is A Forum?[/b][/u] An Internet forum is a facility on the World Wide Web for holding discussions, or the web application software used to provide the facility. Web-based forums, which date from around 1995, perform a similar function as the dial-up bulletin boards and Internet newsgroups that were numerous in the 1980s and 1990s. A sense of virtual community often develops around forums that have regular users. Technology, computer games, and politics are popular areas for forum themes, but there are forums for a huge number of different topics [1].
Internet forums are also commonly referred to as web forums, message boards, discussion boards, discussion forums, discussion groups, bulletin boards (but see also dial-up bulletin boards), fora[sup][2][/sup] (the Latin plural) or simply forums.
[u][b]How Do I Read What People Have Posted?[/b][/u] First Off Click The "Home" Button At The Top Of The Page [img]http://www.rs2armor.com/Pictures/homebutton.gif[/img]
Now Find A Category You Would Like To Read Then Click It
[img]http://www.rs2armor.com/Pictures/cat1.gif[/img]
the word in yellow is an example of a category but it will say something else
now you will see a variety of "Topics" to view one click on it
[img]http://www.rs2armor.com/Pictures/tut383.gif[/img] "Rs2armor Rules" being the topic Name and "Dylan" Being the topic author
Click On The Name (in this pic being "Rs2armor Rules" and you will see what the author wrote.
Congratulations You Have Successfully Views Somebody's Topic!
[b][u]How Do Make My Own Topic?[/u][/b] Follow The Steps On "How Do I Read What People Have Posted?" But Instead Of Clicking On A Subject (EX: and example would be "rs2armor Rules" in the pic above) you going to wanna click "New Topic" Then Fill Out The Info Asked For. Congratulations You Have Successfully Made Your Own Topic!
[b][u]Other Things To Know[/u][/b] There Are Several Things/Images You Should Know Of In Rs2armor's Forums
[img]http://www.rs2armor.com/forums/Themes/default/images/on.gif[/img] Means That There Has Been A New Topic Posted In The Coorasponding Catagory [img]http://www.rs2armor.com/forums/Themes/default/images/on2.gif[/img] Means That There Has Been A New Topic Posted In The Coorasponding Sub-Catagory [img]http://www.rs2armor.com/forums/Themes/default/images/off.gif[/img] Means There Are No New Topics
[img]http://www.rs2armor.com/forums/Themes/default/images/icons/show_sticky.gif[/img] Means A Topic Is Stickied Which Means It Will Forever Stay At The Top Of A Catagory. [img]http://www.rs2armor.com/forums/Themes/default/images/icons/quick_lock.gif[/img] Means A Topic Is Locked Which Means Nobody Put Moderators And Admins May Post There. [img]http://www.rs2armor.com/forums/Themes/default/images/topic/normal_poll.gif[/img] Means There Is A Poll In The Topic. [img]http://www.rs2armor.com/forums/Themes/default/images/topic/my_normal_post.gif[/img] Means You Have Posted In That Topic. [img]http://www.rs2armor.com/forums/Themes/default/images/topic/normal_post.gif[/img] Means That It Is A Normal Topic. [img]http://www.rs2armor.com/forums/Themes/default/images/topic/hot_post.gif[/img] Means That The Topic Is "Hot" (15-24 Replies). [img]http://www.rs2armor.com/forums/Themes/default/images/topic/veryhot_post.gif[/img] Means That The Topic Is "Very Hot" (25+ Replies)
[center]From www.rs2armor.com/forums[/center]

more outta bordom; thought maybe it might noobs who actually dont know wat there doing

item.title: How To Post
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

These how to post threads are pointless. They are not useful because no one reads them and takes them seriously, and they are not comical or even interesting. I have to wonder why people so often make threads like this.

Read full topic

item.title: How To Post
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

OK this may not be as good or as funny at the sticky but i thought id post it n e way + its more for this version of smf; here come the flames; oh yeahs btw this was made for my forums so a few things may b different

What Is A Forum?
An Internet forum is a facility on the World Wide Web for holding discussions, or the web application software used to provide the facility. Web-based forums, which date from around 1995, perform a similar function as the dial-up bulletin boards and Internet newsgroups that were numerous in the 1980s and 1990s. A sense of virtual community often develops around forums that have regular users. Technology, computer games, and politics are popular areas for forum themes, but there are forums for a huge number of different topics [1].

Internet forums are also commonly referred to as web forums, message boards, discussion boards, discussion forums, discussion groups, bulletin boards (but see also dial-up bulletin boards), fora[sup][2][/sup] (the Latin plural) or simply forums.

How Do I Read What People Have Posted?
First Off Click The “Home” Button At The Top Of The Page

Now Find A Category You Would Like To Read Then Click It

the word in yellow is an example of a category but it will say something else

now you will see a variety of “Topics” to view one click on it


“Rs2armor Rules” being the topic Name and “Dylan” Being the topic author

Click On The Name (in this pic being “Rs2armor Rules” and you will see what the author wrote.

Congratulations You Have Successfully Views Somebody’s Topic!

How Do Make My Own Topic?
Follow The Steps On “How Do I Read What People Have Posted?” But Instead Of Clicking On A Subject (EX: and example would be “rs2armor Rules” in the pic above) you going to wanna click “New Topic” Then Fill Out The Info Asked For.
Congratulations You Have Successfully Made Your Own Topic!

Other Things To Know
There Are Several Things/Images You Should Know Of In Rs2armor’s Forums

Means That There Has Been A New Topic Posted In The Coorasponding Catagory
Means That There Has Been A New Topic Posted In The Coorasponding Sub-Catagory
Means There Are No New Topics

Means A Topic Is Stickied Which Means It Will Forever Stay At The Top Of A Catagory.
Means A Topic Is Locked Which Means Nobody Put Moderators And Admins May Post There.
Means There Is A Poll In The Topic.
Means You Have Posted In That Topic.
Means That It Is A Normal Topic.
Means That The Topic Is “Hot” (15-24 Replies).
Means That The Topic Is “Very Hot” (25+ Replies)

[center]From www.rs2armor.com/forums[/center]
